metadata.title: CVE-2023-43641 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: libcue provides an API for parsing and extracting data from CUE sheets.Versions 2.2.1 and prior are vulnerable to out-of-bounds array access. Auser of the GNOME desktop environment can be exploited by downloading a cuesheet from a malicious webpage. Because the file is saved to `~/Downloads`,it is then automatically scanned by tracker-miners. And because it has a.cue filename extension, tracker-miners use libcue to parse the file. Thefile exploits the vulnerability in libcue to gain code execution. Thisissue is patched in version 2.3.0.

criterions.comment: libcue: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
